summary: Over the six-hour window winds were steady around 5.7 m/s with low variability but included a brief extreme gust to 25.8 m/s; mean power output was low (~0.16) with modest variability. Rotor speed variability was low while generator speed showed large fluctuations (std ≈ 59.7), blade pitch averaged slightly negative (~−1.45°) and yaw misalignment was consistently high (~12.6°); power residuals were persistently negative (~−0.077). Temperature averaged about 50°C and the monitored status remained normal throughout.
